description:
Take your toddler to the trails with this shred-ready balance bike. Kids Ride shotgun brings the joy of mountain biking to littlest riders in your family. The Dirt Hero line has enduro ready features and geometry, giving it a safer and more stable ride on rough terrain. Outfitted with a rear hydraulic disc brake, new riders get a lot of stopping power from little squeeze – great when you don’t have a lot of hand strength. More than just a stand-in for training wheels, balance bikes are a lot of fun on, and off road.

  • Magura MT4 hydraulic disc brake on the back wheel for reliable braking in any conditions
  • Magura HC1 brake lever has an easily adjustable reach to fit all sizes of growing hands
  • Stable mountain bike geometry, with a slack front end and lower center of gravity than traditional balance bikes
  • Vee Crown Gem pneumatic trail tires are heavily lugged for great grip on the straights and in the corners
  • Front fender helps keep the trail off the rider
  • Sealed cartridge bearings can stand up to trail muck
  • Comes with 14in. wheels, but also accepts 12in. wheels, making it hand-me-down ready
  • Best suited for ages 3-5 years – minimum inseam of 36.7cm (14.4in.)
  • Includes Shred ‘til Bed animal stickers for a little customization
name: Kids Ride Shotgun 14 Dirt Hero Off-Road Balance Bike with Brake - Children
